DOC.brief_summary: The study design determine extent food contain plant-based ingredient affect blood glucose hormonal response healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Plant-based Ingredient Generalized Hormonal Responses
DOC.criteria: Healthy male , Age start study > 20 < 50 year ; Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 20,0 ≤ 25,0 kg/m2 ; Apparently healthy : medical condition might affect study measurement , absorption , metabolism distribution ( include diabetes type 1 type 2 , gastrointestinal dysfunction , gastrointestinal surgery inflammatory disease ) ; Fasting blood glucose value subject ≥ 3.4 ≤ 6.1 mmol/litre ( i.e . 62110 mg/dl ) screening ; Agreeing inform medically relevant personal testresults physician ; Informed consent sign ; Willing comply study protocol study ; Covered Health Insurance System and/or compliance recommendation National Law force relate biomedical research . Accessible vein arm determine examination screen . Any history diabetes , hyper ( hypo ) glycemia disorder glucose metabolism ; Blood donation past 2 month ; Reported participation another nutritional biomedical trial 3 month prestudy examination study ; Reported participation night shift work two week prior prestudy investigation study . Night work define work midnight 6.00 AM ; Reported intense sporting activity > 10h/w ; Consumption > 21 alcoholic drink typical week ; Not use eat breakfast ; Reported use nicotine containing product six month precede study study ; Use medication interferes study measurement ; Reported dietary habit : medically prescribe diet , slimming diet ; Not use eat 3 meal day ; Vegetarian ; Reported weight loss/gain ( > 10 % ) last six month study ; Being employee Unilever CRO ; Allergy intolerance food product aversion food product provide study ; Subject contact case emergency ; Subject , judgment investigator , likely noncompliant uncooperative study , unable cooperate language problem , poor mental development ; Subject guardianship ; Subject would receive 4500 euro 's indemnity participation biomedical research within 12 last month , include indemnity present study .
